metadata.name: Clear PowerShell History - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-psreadlineoption')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('–historysavestyle')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('savenothing')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('set-psreadlineoption')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-historysavestyle')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('savenothing')) OR (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('del')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-item')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('rm'))) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('(get-psreadlineoption).historysavepath')))

output.summary: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate PowerShell scripts Reference: https://gist.github.com/hook-s3c/7363a856c3cdbadeb71085147f042c1a
